title: Understanding Trends in Distance and Open Education: Online Learning Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy (Smartphone Utilization Skills) and At Least One Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Conducting small-scale projects using smartphone-based collaboration tools in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic concepts of MOOCs and OERs and analyze at least two real-world cases
Learners can complete remote education design projects utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners can derive at least three evaluation criteria for assessing the effectiveness of online education from the learner's perspective

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
